name: Wallet Control
author: Pelat
notes:
Got late kog but didn’t like this meta too much.
After 2 games, I decided that Parallel Twister wasn’t that good as Divine Wrath because I have just 2 Rocket (17 packs away from my last one, hopefully less). 
Divine Wrath turns out to be amazing, great card against every single deck in the meta, but still won’t run more than 1 since it could be clunky sometimes
